mapper.select: SELECT review_link AS reviewLink, user_name AS userName, user_link AS userLink, review_date AS reviewDate, star_score AS starScore, review_title AS reviewTitle, review_content AS reviewContent, corp_name AS companyName FROM android_app_review, corporation, review_corp_relation WHERE android_app_review.review_id = review_corp_relation.review_id AND review_corp_relation.corp_id = corporation.corp_id
